transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .bw-list-item{background:#fff;border-radius:32px;box-shadow:0 6px 14px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.059),0 -4px 14px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.039)}.bw-list-item .bw-list-item-title{color:#4a4a4a;font-size:20px;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:2%;line-height:28px;margin-bottom:16px}.bw-list-item .bw-list-item-content{color:#666;font-family:PingFang SC;font-size:16px;font-weight:400;letter-spacing:2%;line-height:22.4px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis}.bw-list-item .bw-button:active,.bw-list-item .bw-button:hover{background-color:#61cd57!important}.bw-list-item .bw-button:active span,.bw-list-item .bw-button:hover span{color:#fff}.bw-list-item .bw-button:active img,.bw-list-item .bw-button:hover img{filter:brightness(0) invert(1)}
